title: Photodegradation of the main synthetic musk (HHCB) in water: kinetic study and influencing factors
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00351A, Paper
Hatice Turan, Mathieu Sebilo, Thierry Pigot, Mathilde Monperrus
Galaxolide (HHCB) is the most common synthetic musk compound detected in numerous daily products.
